title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5114.4 - Issuance or transfer of interests; approval
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5114.4 - Issuance or transfer of interests; approval

State Regulations

No person shall issue or transfer any security or
ownership interest in a video lottery gaming agent or managing agent, or any
non-publicly traded subsidiary or holding company thereof, without the express, prior written approval of the commission. The commission shall not grant any
such approval without considering the provisions of
licensing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5114.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
